statements: SELECT * FROM MentalHealthProgress
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, progress_date FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT progress_notes FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE patient_id = '987e6543-e89b-41d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY progress_date DESC
SELECT goal_id, progress_percentage FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE patient_id = '789e6543-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(*) AS progress_count FROM MentalHealthProgress GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE therapist_id = '123456789' ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, progress_notes FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT therapist_id, progress_date FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE goal_id = '987654321' AND progress_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, progress_percentage FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE progress_percentage BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthProgress WHERE therapist_id = '456789123' AND progress_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(therapist_id) AS therapist_count FROM Therapists GROUP BY therapist_name;
SELECT patient_name, goal_description FROM Patients WHERE therapist_id = 2 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_id FROM Therapists WHERE therapist_name LIKE '%Miller%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE therapist_id = 1 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, goal_description FROM Patients WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT therapist_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS patient_count FROM Therapists JOIN Patients ON Therapists.therapist_id = Patients.therapist_id GROUP BY therapist_name;
SELECT patient_name, goal_description FROM Patients WHERE goal_description LIKE '%progress%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, COUNT(*) AS notes_count FROM Patients WHERE therapist_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY patient_id, therapist_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, total_patients FROM Therapists WHERE specialty='Physical Therapy';
SELECT goal_description, target_date FROM Goals WHERE therapist_id=1 AND patient_id=2;
SELECT therapist_name, goal_description FROM Therapists JOIN Goals ON Therapists.therapist_id = Goals.therapist_id;
SELECT patient_name, goal1_progress, goal2_progress FROM Patients;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM Therapists WHERE total_patients > 5;
SELECT goal_description FROM Goals WHERE target_date > DATE('2022-01-01');
SELECT therapist_name, total_patients FROM Therapists ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT patient_name, therapist_name, goal_description, target_date FROM Patients, Therapists, Goals WHERE Patients.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id AND Patients.patient_id = Goals.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Therapists WHERE specialty='Physical Therapy';
SELECT therapist_name, location FROM Therapists WHERE location='New York';
SELECT goal_description, target_date, progress_percentage FROM Goals WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_name, age, therapist_name FROM Patients JOIN Therapists ON Patients.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name LIMIT 5
SELECT goal_description, target_date FROM Goals WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY target_date DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT Patients.patient_name, ProgressUpdates.update_description, ProgressUpdates.update_date FROM Patients JOIN ProgressUpdates ON Patients.patient_id = ProgressUpdates.patient_id ORDER BY Patients.patient_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(*) AS goal_count FROM Goals GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY goal_count DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, therapist_id FROM Patients ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT specialty, experience_years FROM Therapists WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM Goals WHERE target_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Patients.name, Goals.goal_description FROM Patients JOIN Goals ON Patients.patient_id = Goals.patient_id WHERE Goals.target_date >= '2022-09-01';

SELECT Patients.name, Therapists.name, Progress.progress_notes FROM Patients JOIN Therapists ON Patients.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id LEFT JOIN Progress ON Patients.patient_id = Progress.goal_id;
SELECT Reviews.review_date, Reviews.rating, Therapists.specialty FROM Reviews JOIN Therapists ON Reviews.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id WHERE Reviews.rating > 3 ORDER BY Reviews.rating DESC;

SELECT Patients.name AS patient_name, Therapists.name AS therapist_name, Goals.goal_description, Progress.progress_notes FROM Patients JOIN Therapists ON Patients.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id JOIN Goals ON Patients.patient_id = Goals.patient_id LEFT JOIN Progress ON Goals.goal_id = Progress.goal_id ORDER BY Patients.name ASC, Goals.target_date DESC;
